text: Burt Styler (February 20, 1925 â€“ June 13, 2011) was an American television screenwriter and movie producer. Burt was born in New York City, New York. He won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Writing for a Comedy Series in 1972 for writing the episode "Edith's Problem" on All in the Family. Styler died from heart failure on June 13, 2011 in Tarzana, Los Angeles, California. He was aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2011 deaths Category:American television producers Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Deaths from heart failure
title: Burt Styler
